title: Cardsystems Solutions Inc.
alternative_name: Third-party payment processor for Visa, Mastercard, Amex,  and Discover
text: CardSystems was fingered by MasterCard after it spotted fraud on credit card accounts and found a common thread, tracing it back to CardSystems.  An unauthorized entity put a specific code into CardSystems' network, enabling the person or group to gain access to the data. It's not clear how many of the 40 million accounts were actually stolen.
